name: FasyCity Alpha
description:
You become a husky who lives life with his elder brother in this world.
Download and Explore this furry world.

KeyBind or Controls

W A S D To move (Hold Space To Run,)
(Hold C To Sneaking)
Press/Click [ V ] to Zoom in/out
Press [ i ] To open the inventory
Click E to interact
Use the Key up and down/Mouse Wheel to use the Phone!
Use [G] [H] [J] [K] For Dialogue Choice
Press Space to skip dialogue

In-game tutorials:

The game was made in Scratch #Scratch
By a wanderer little boy 16
